title: Reorganize Warehouse Layout
description: To improve efficiency, a warehouse manager wants to reorganize the layout, moving high-velocity items closer to the shipping docks.

tasks.description: Analyze sales data to identify the fastest-moving products (ABC analysis).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a report identifying the 'A' items (highest velocity).

tasks.description: Generate a new warehouse layout plan that moves the 'A' items to the most accessible locations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new slotting plan for the warehouse.

tasks.description: Create work orders for the warehouse staff to move the inventory to the new locations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates the tasks for the physical reorganization.
